title: Woman ‘hurled malnourished puppy out of car window’
text:
Princess Franklin, 31, has been arrested and charged with animal cruelty after she allegedly threw a emaciated dog out of her car window. (Picture:Harris County Constable Precinct 4)

A woman has been arrested after police say she hurled a malnourished puppy out of a car window.

Princess Franklin, 31, has been charged with animal cruelty after she allegedly tossed the dog out of her car in Houston, Texas on October 13.

Franklin reportedly told police that her former roommate left the dog behind.

She claimed she did not know what to do with the puppy, so she decided to ‘throw’ it on the side of the road, police said. Franklin then reportedly fled the scene.

It is unclear if her vehicle was moving when she allegedly threw the dog out of the window, but deputies referred to her as the ‘driver,’ according to ABC13.

The Chernobyl residents who refused to leave against all government and safety advice

Authorities were able to locate the dog the next day in the 18400 block of the Continental Parkway. Harris County Animal Control has since taken custody of the dog.

Advertisement

Advertisement

A photo released of the emaciated dog shows that its rib cage and spine were almost completely visible.

Police say Franklin is also charged with abandonment to a non-livestock animal, but they are working to determine if their will be additional charges filed against Franklin.
description: Princess Franklin, 31, has been charged with animal cruelty after she allegedly tossed the dog out of her car in Houston, Texas on Oct 13.
